description:
Gravos uses his powerful sword against Lina and the gang, and Inverse must rely on the Dragon Slave. Suddenly, after the island is destroyed, a bridge appears between the two kingdoms!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ready for Exile! Isn`t Two People`s Love Eternal?
Résolus à l`exil ! Leur amour est éternel, hein ?
Tsuihou Kakugo! Futari no Ai wa Eien yo ne?
Готовьтесь к изгнанию! Разве любовь двоих не вечна?
追放覚悟! 二人の愛は永遠よね?
